news.title: Opendoor shares are surging again as hyped real estate stock leads meme rally revival
news.summary: The ticker $OPEN has been heavily cited on WallStreetBets, the online forum behind the infamous GameStop mania in 2021.

news.title: Bessent says Powell doesn't need to resign but should conduct internal review
news.summary: There have been no indications from Powell that he plans to step down despite a barrage of criticism from the Trump administration. Powell has been in the job for more than a decade.

news.title: Credit card startup Imprint beats big banks for Rakuten co-brand deal
news.summary: Imprint is a 5-year-old credit card startup taking on industry giants. There is a new player making waves in an industry dominated by big banks.

news.title: Bessent says Aug. 12 China tariff deadline likely to be extended, talks planned in Stockholm
news.summary: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said the U.S. is likely to hash out an extension of President Donald Trump's upcoming trade deadline with China.

news.title: Top economist Mohamed El-Erian breaks ranks with Wall Street and says Powell should resign to preserve Fed independence
news.summary: El-Erian is president of Queens' College at Cambridge University. He said he was aware that his view did not align with the Wall Street consensus.

news.title: Here are the stocks that could get a boost from Trump’s ‘AI Action Plan’
news.summary: The Trump administration is set to roll out its “AI Action Plan,’ and new executive orders on AI are expected. In tandem with a presidential speech on Wednesday, the administration is expected to unveil the plan.

news.title: Picking stocks is a losing bet, this market legend says. Here’s his winning strategy.
news.summary: ‘The market knows more than you,’ DFA’s David Booth points out. And he never forgets it.

news.title: Coca-Cola confirms Coke with cane sugar is coming, and its stock is falling
news.summary: Coca-Cola said innovations will include Coke with cane sugar, as President Donald Trump stated last week. The stock fell as quarterly revenue came up a bit shy.

news.title: This one money move guarantees you inflation-proof income in retirement
news.summary: Upon retiring, cash out your 401(k) and buy a bond "ladder" of Treasury inflation-protected securities. Buy a bond “ladder’s’ worth of inflation-protectable Treasury bonds.

news.title: Lockheed Martin’s stock rocked by big profit miss, as problems with classified programs continue
news.summary: Lockheed Martin’s stock led the S&P 500's early decliners after a $1.6 billion charge led to a big profit miss.
